name: SimpleTing 1
description:
SimpleTing 1 is a simple die-and-retry platformer, consisting of only one un-finished level at the moment. Your goal is to advance through the obstacles, made of blocks, which can be in three states: Green, Yellow and Red. I wouldn't advise touching the red ones. Some of them will have their colour changed over time, some won't.
I hope you'll enjoy it, and stay tuned ;)

Default controls:

  • Z/W/Spacebar/ Gamepad A: Jump
  • Q/A/Left/ Gamepad left stick : Go left
  • D/Gamepad left stick : Go right
  • R/Gamepad Y : Restart the current level
